document_data.name: ''Watery Grave''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Watery grave''''' was the name of a type of [[magic]]al [[staff|staves]].
document_data.Description: A ''watery grave'' was made out of blue glass. It was decorated with images of waves and sea monsters that were etched into the glass staff.
document_data.Powers: A ''watery grave'' was a charge-based [[magic item]]. It allowed the casting of ''[[dehydrate]]'' and ''[[rushing waters]]''. If the user was prepared to deplete the staff of double charges, it also allowed the casting of ''[[drown (spell)|drown]]'' and ''[[contagious fog]]''.
document_data.History: To [[Item enchantment|create]] a ''watery grave'', the spells ''contagious fog'', ''dehydrate'', ''drown'', and ''rushing waters'' was needed. These staves were developed in the [[Underdark]].
document_data.Reputation: The crafting of a ''watery grave'' was done by powerful casters of the Underdark and these staves were unknown on the surface.
